original_text: And he hasted, and took the ashes away from his face; and the king of Israel discerned him that he was of the prophets.
korean_text: 그가 급히 자기의 눈을 가린 수건을 벗으니 이스라엘 왕이 그는 선지자 중의 한 사람인 줄을 알아본지라

sentences.original_text: and took the ashes away from his face
and the king of Israel discerned him
that he was of the prophets
